subscribe.subject: Subscription Confirmation
subscribe.thankYou: Thank you for subscribing. We're excited to have you with us on this journey!
subscribe.ignore: If you did not subscribe, please ignore this email.

unsubscribe.subject: Unsubscribe Confirmation
unsubscribe.successfully: We're sorry to see you go. You have successfully unsubscribed.
unsubscribe.contactUs: If you did not request this, please contact us immediately.
